entry.title: Manchin Calls For Deal On Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid In New Congress

media:group.media:title: Manchin Calls For Deal On Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid In New Congress
media:group.media:description:
Centrist Sen. Joe Manchin (D-W.Va.) on Thursday called for a broad bipartisan deal to protect the solvency of Social Security, Medicare and Medicaid, popular programs that face serious funding issues over the next few decades.
READ MORE: https://trib.al/FUrxKHd

entry.title: Here’s How A GOP Win In November Might Affect 2023 Defense Policy

media:group.media:title: Here’s How A GOP Win In November Might Affect 2023 Defense Policy
media:group.media:description:
Bigger defense budgets, heavier scrutiny of military aid to Ukraine and a tougher line on China are all on the horizon should Republicans take control of the House or Senate after midterm elections, experts say.
READ MORE: https://trib.al/CVhI6PY

entry.title: Oz PASSES Fetterman In New Poll, Red TSUNAMI Ahead? | What America's Thinking

media:group.media:title: Oz PASSES Fetterman In New Poll, Red TSUNAMI Ahead? | What America's Thinking
media:group.media:description:
Spencer Kimball, the director of Emerson College polls, speaks with The Hill's Julia Manchester and Rafael Bernal to give his take on Emerson's final polling before the midterms wrap up. He also weighs in on the blind spots in this year's races. #midterms, battleground #earlyvoting
Poll references: PA: https://emersoncollegepolling.com/pennsylvania-2022-oz-and-fetterman-in-two-point-race-half-of-voters-say-senate-debate-worsened-their-opinion-of-fetterman/
GA: https://emersoncollegepolling.com/georgia-2022-warnock-with-edge-over-walker-as-run-off-election-looms/

entry.title: Battleground Pennsylvania To Play Pivotal Role In Midterms

media:group.media:title: Battleground Pennsylvania To Play Pivotal Role In Midterms
media:group.media:description:
The Hill traveled across Pennsylvania ahead of Election Day to get a sense of what issues voters were most concerned about in the state that is seen as a microcosm of the country.
Republicans, including Oz, have zeroed in on rising crime rates and inflation in the closing days of the campaign. Democrats, like Fetterman, have also addressed economic issues while also talking about abortion access as the main part of their campaign platform.

entry.title: Jack Black Says It Feels Like ‘The End Of The World’ If Voters Don’t Turn Out For Midterms

media:group.media:title: Jack Black Says It Feels Like ‘The End Of The World’ If Voters Don’t Turn Out For Midterms
media:group.media:description:
Jack Black says he has a dire feeling about the future if midterm voters don’t turn out in droves on Election Day.
READ MORE: https://trib.al/uCQdgqL

entry.title: AZ Senate Race In LIMBO? GOP Plans Covid/Fauci Focus, Security PUSH After Pelosi Attack: The Debrief

media:group.media:title: AZ Senate Race In LIMBO? GOP Plans Covid/Fauci Focus, Security PUSH After Pelosi Attack: The Debrief
media:group.media:description: The Hill's editor-in-chief Bob Cusack sits down with Robby Soave to discuss The Hill's top headlines.

entry.title: Libertarian Party Chair: No One Is ENTITLED To Your Vote

media:group.media:title: Libertarian Party Chair: No One Is ENTITLED To Your Vote
media:group.media:description:
Chair of the National Libertarian Party Angela McArdle discusses Libertarian candidate Marc Victor, who dropped out of the Arizona Senate race on Tuesday and encouraged voters to vote for GOP candidate Blake Masters instead of Democratic candidate Mark Kelly. #Arizona #BlakeMasters #MarcVictor #MarkKelly
About Rising: Rising is a weekday morning show with bipartisan hosts that breaks the mold of morning TV by taking viewers inside the halls of Washington power like never before. The show leans into the day's political cycle with cutting edge analysis from DC insiders who can predict what is going to happen. entry.title: Green Party Candidate Accuses Dems Of Trying To BLOCK Candidacy, 'Don't Vote IDENTITY POLITICS'

media:group.media:description:
Briahna Joy Gray and Robby Soave speak with Matthew Hoh, the Green Party candidate running for the U.S. Senate in North Carolina. Hoh is hoping to offer an alternative to the two-party system, which he maintains is "harmful." #GreenParty, #midterms #battlegroundstates

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: STREAMING Is The New Frontier Of Political Ads Dallas Lawrence

media:group.media:title: STREAMING Is The New Frontier Of Political Ads Dallas Lawrence
media:group.media:description:
Dallas Lawrence, the senior vice president at Samba TV, weighs in on a new Samba TV and Harris-X survey that found that most registered voters no longer have traditional television subscriptions, prompting a need for campaigns to increasingly shift advertising to streaming services. #television #streaming #campaigns
